definition[0]: an idea that is suggested as an explanation for something, but that has not yet been proved to be true
example[0]: One hypothesis is that the victim fell asleep while driving.
example[1]: We hope that further research will confirm our hypothesis.
example[2]: The authors reject the hypothesis about unemployment contributing to crime.
definition[1]: ideas or guesses, rather than facts
definition[2]: an idea that can be tested to see if it is true or not
example[4]: These results support the hypothesis that individuals are willing to pay more in order to live in communities that provide high-quality services.
